import plotly.express as px
px.set_mapbox_access_token("Your Token")

fig = px.scatter_mapbox(new_df, lon="latitude", lat="longitude", size="price_doc",
                  color_continuous_scale=px.colors.cyclical.IceFire, size_max=15, zoom=10, width=500, height=800)

source.b1a1af1c:
In this Kernel I will show you how I drew the price changes on the Moscow map.
You will need:
1. to install Plotly
2. Get your token from https://www.mapbox.com/
3. And boom! Magic no?

Please refer to the doc. of Plotly for more
